item.title: Get Paid For Pooping
item.description: Yes I know it sounds dumb but, if during your working hours you go to the toilet, technically, you are getting paid for it. ðŸ’© Use case Alright, lets say you you earn $10 an hour and during those 8 hours of daily work, you go twice to the bathroom, for around 10 minutes each time. Then a simple multiplication shows that your “poop time” is worth around $3.34 per day!

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello ðŸ˜ƒ So this is the mandatory “Hello World” blog post. The intent of this blog is just to keep track of my achievements, projects and also Technical how-to/tutorials Bugs or gotchas that might be useful in the future Setup & configuration Stuff that I keep forgetting and keep googling.

Some of my side projects: Flask Template Bootstrap Flask project to use in Hackathons. python Santosbot Motivational Slack bot that mimic clichÃ© sentences from Portuguese guru, Gustavo Santos. python3 async heroku vuejs andreffs.com This website, build with Hugo. hugo go jupyter notebooks static hosting Sheetsu Python SDK I had the luck of being feature for building Sheetsu's Python SDK.

item.title: About
item.description: ðŸ‘‹ My name is AndrÃ© Silva and I’m a 27 y/old Portuguese Software Engineer from Lisbon that likes to code. # A little bit about me I wasn’t always focused on the development world. During high school I got the change to internship on a consulting firm in my hometown, mainly working with setting up data centers, and configuring network systems. After high school I went to college to take a Computer Science Bachelor.
